name: Blessings Marquee & Events
location: Main Margalla Rd, Golra E-11, Islamabad
description: Blessings Marquee & Events is a complete solution to all the events and catering requirements of a client. It offers lavish canopies, luxurious furnishings, fine china, silverware, beautiful décor, and impeccable service.

name: Aura Grande
description: Aura Grande is an excellent option for wedding events, offering a unique and ultimate experience. It provides an elegant setting for your special day.

name: 1969 & time goes on
location: Garden Avenue, Shakarparian National Park, Islamabad
description: "1969 & Time Goes On" is an elegant and timeless wedding venue located in a picturesque setting. It offers a perfect blend of vintage charm and modern amenities.

name: The Royals Event Complex
location: Main Margalla Rd, Golra E-11, Islamabad
description: The Royals Event Complex is a whole new setup of marquee on the main Margalla Road Islamabad with its top of the line services and exclusive ambiance. We offer sophisticated, versatile wedding Marquee for social events and gatherings of all sizes. We offer different services like catering decorations.

name: Monal Marquee
location: Main Margalla Rd, NPF E 11/4 E-11, Islamabad
description: Having attained the highest standards in sophisticate dining and gourmet cuisines, ‘The Monal’ now offers the same exhilarating experience to you at your doorstep. And not just this, we also have the complete solution to all the other catering requirements of a discerning client – from lavish canopies and luxurious furnishings, the finest china and silver, to a captivating thematic décor and impeccable service. Our catering menu covers the complete range of the delectable Barbeque, Pakistani, Sub-continental, Kabuli, Mediterranean, French, Italian, Chinese and Thai dishes served at ‘The Monal’. To tantalize your taste buds, we prepare food live at your premises and serve it sizzling hot, keeping the food’s taste and aroma at its best. So be it a small family dinner, a birthday party, a gala, or a corporate dinner, or be it an extensive wedding function, leave it to us to enthral your guests with hospitality and entertainment they will never forget.

name: The Vintage Marquee
location: Before Burki PSO station, Marquees complex Road, Islamabad
description: Wedding Marquee - Event Management - Wedding Planners Decorators - Caterers

name: Pavilion Marquee
location: Service Rd E, PSO Petrol Pump, Islamabad Expressway
description: A completely customizable wedding venue that can be transformed as per your taste and preferences.

name: White House Marquee
description: White House Marquee is a full-service event and venue management company offering high-quality services and complete event planning.

name: Anabia's Garden
description: Anabia's Garden in Islamabad is a delightful venue nestled in nature's beauty, providing a serene and idyllic backdrop for your special occasions.

name: Majesty Marquee Bahria
description: Majesty Marquee Bahria offers a luxurious venue for weddings and events with stunning views and top-notch facilities.

name: La Montana Restaurant
location: Margalla Hills، 9 KMs, Pir Sohawa Road, Islamabad
description: Welcome to La Montana Restaurant, the dream wedding venue for destination weddings. Nestled between the majestic mountains of Haripur Hazara and the stunning skyline of Islamabad, our exclusive rooftop venue offers an unparalleled setting for your special event. With breathtaking views stretching from the serene beauty of Haripur Hazara to the bustling cityscape of Islamabad, your guests will be mesmerized by the natural beauty and urban charm surrounding them. La Montana is an enchanting venue for your special event/occasion. La Montana is the place where the every dine-in guest will get the Natural & Panoramic view of Margalla Hills. La Montana is the place where you dream come to reality offering a captivating atmosphere and top-notch service.

name: Embassy Lodge
description: Embassy Lodge has managed Hotels and Guesthouses in Islamabad for over twenty years.

name: Clay Oven Marquee
location: Near PSO Petrol Pump, Expressway, Islamabad
description: The Clay Oven is a true pioneer in event management, offering services that ensure your event creates memories for a lifetime!

description: Event lawns in the heart of Margalla hills. Available for bookings. Book through Shadiyana Now!

name: Empire Marquee

description: Empire Marquees, Leaders in Pakistani Weddings with best packages and discounted prices. With years of experience in Weddings & Event Planning, Catering and Food services, we commit the highest quality standards for your event. We promise you that we will make your event the most memorable.

name: The Manor Marquee
description: Best Venue in Town! The Manor in Islamabad is a distinguished venue, known for its sophistication and versatility, making it a perfect choice for your special events. With its elegant ambiance and exceptional service, The Manor ensures that your gatherings are stylish and memorable in the capital city.
